Package software.accesibility

Interface Summary
StateAction Interface to allow passing methods as parameters.
Transitionable Interface defining what can be part of a Finite State Machine
 

Class Summary
AudioPlayer Class for isPlaying audio (WAV) files.
Election The class that generates a FiniteStateMachine based on a given ElectionSpecification Things TBD for this version: Implement Rankedquestion (grab code from Multiplequestion and just change sound files) All other +++ issues Cleanup code Ideas for future version: Read FSM structure from an XML file rather than hardcode it
Etegrity  
FiniteStateMachine The finite state machine that holds all the states and transitions It contains wrappers for accessing the states inside.
Globals  
Print Helper class with various static print methods
State The class for each state used in the FiniteStateMachine.
TransitionArray A class for storing transitions between states for various inputs A TransitionArray needs to be created for each state
